project.name: composure-hx
project.description:
A haxe library to assist coding in a composition design pattern. The library also allows for dependency injection via metadata.
Intro to Composure - with Hello World
Composure Wiki
Generated Documentation
project.version:
UniqueList now uses FastList for all targets (different ordering was causing depth ordering issues)
Injectors now accept EnumValue objects as interestedTraitType
Resolved logging issues when debugging on non-flash targets
Added 'universal/uni' access to injectors
Fixed internal issue in TraitCollection which meant incorrect item references where being passed to injectors/marriers
